press_menu_buttons_v2.description: Presses a sequence of buttons to navigate menus, bypassing the directional/action mixing restriction. Use for menu navigation ONLY. Returns the sequence of buttons as a JSON array.
press_menu_buttons_v2.python_script:
import json

history.commit_message: Fixing input handling to use the global input_data dictionary directly.

find_path_v3_fixed.description: Calculates the shortest path between two coordinates on the current map. Returns button strings if autopress_buttons is true, otherwise returns coordinate objects. Handles one-way ledges. Avoids walls, objects, and unseen tiles for reliability.

history.commit_message: Updated find_path_v3_fixed to handle one-way ledges (LEDGE_HOP_DOWN) correctly. Approaching from below or the sides is prohibited.
Updated find_path_v3_fixed to treat unseen tiles as impassable for reliable pathfinding. Only known passable tiles will be used.
